1.<if_woman>「ありがとう…… <pc>ちゃん……！| この試練を 乗りこ: <if_woman>Thank you<pc>   Girl...! If I can survive this ordeal... I|will become a great sage. I can become...|Right?<else>Thank you<pc> Kun...! If I can survive this ordeal... I'll|become a great sage. I can become... Right?<endif>

14.「ここへ着くなり アーニアが豹変してな。| いよいよ 本当に 限界が来たらしい…: As soon as we got here, Ernesto changed... I|think I've really reached my limit...

15.「シェリルッ！！ <cs_pchero>が 来たぞ！| 時間がない！ 早く 術を: Cheryl!<cs_pchero>They're coming! There's no time! You have to|do it quickly!

16.「アーニア 見ていてくれ……。| 私の手で この呪われた運命に| 終止符を打つ…: Arnea, watch me. With my own hands, I will|put an end to this cursed fate.

40.「そうして 世界中の賢者を 闇賢者に変え| 余の支配する世界を 創造するのだ！|: I will turn all the wise men of the world|into dark wise men and create a world of my|own! That is my ambition!

|power far greater than that of the Dark Sage.

42.「アーニアを 闇賢者にすれば| 野望の成就に さらに近づいたというに……！| シ: If we could just get Arnea to become the Dark|Sage, we'd be that much closer to fulfilling|our ambition. Cheryl... Because of you...

43.「ムァーハッハッハ！ だがな……| じつは アーニアよりも 優れた駒を| すでに: Mwah-ha-ha! But you see... In fact, I've|already found a pawn even better than|Ernesto.

|all.

61.「……思えば| アーニアの呪いを 引き受けたときから| 私は 愚かな行為を繰り返: ... Looking back, ever since I took on|Arnea's curse, I've been repeating my|foolishness...

62.「おのれを過信し 誰の言葉にも 耳を貸さず| あまつさえ…… ただひとりの親友す: I was so sure of myself that I didn't listen|to a word anyone said. I couldn't even trust|my only friend.

63.「まだ幼き 私とアーニアが| 王立研究院の門を たたいたとき| ティーザさんは: When Ernesto and I were very young and|knocked on the door of the Royal Academy of|Sciences, Miss Tisa said...

64.「あまたの愚かしさの先に| まことの賢なる道が ひらかれていると……。: That beyond all the foolishness, a true and|wise path will open up...

70.<if_woman>「やっぱり <pc>ちゃんは スゴイよ！| ホントに ホント: <if_woman>of course<pc>   You're amazing! Really, really, really,|really, really! I'm so glad I met you!<else>of course<pc> You're amazing! Really, really, really,|really, really! I'm so glad I met you!<endif>

I believe the shortcut to becoming a great|sage is to learn different things inside and|outside the Institute, and to teach them to|
